meanings.sent1: In a game, when you roll the dice, you win if you get a number in the thirties.
meanings.sent2: My grandma's house number is in the thirties, so it's easy to find.
meanings.sent3: At the store, I bought thirty candies, but the cashier accidentally gave me candies in the thirties instead!
meanings.sent4: The thirties on the thermometer indicated a very hot day.
meanings.sent5: The thirties on the clock showed it was time for lunch.

meanings.definition: The decade of years from 30 to 39.
meanings.sent1: My parents got married in their thirties and had me soon after.
meanings.sent2: During the thirties, many people faced economic challenges due to the Great Depression.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could go back to my thirties and relive all the fun moments!
meanings.sent4: The fashion trends of the thirties are making a comeback in modern styles.
meanings.sent5: Living in the thirties was a time of great change and innovation.

meanings.sent1: In her thirties, she achieved great success in her career.
meanings.sent2: Many people say their thirties are the best years of their lives.
meanings.sent3: When I reach my thirties, I hope to travel the world and explore new cultures.
meanings.sent4: His thirties brought him wisdom and a deeper understanding of life.
meanings.sent5: Being in your thirties means you are still young but gaining valuable experience.
